item.title: Unbreaking a bike with code
item.description: After wanting one for many years, I finally pulled the trigger and bought a 3D printer as a birthday gift to myself. And it’s been a blast! I’ve printed everything I’ve gotten my hands on, but I have had this nagging feeling that I was just replicating, I wasn’t creating. One (un)lucky day day though, my son broke the chain guard on is bike. I jumped on the chance to prove myself and took some quick notes and then took a photo of it because paper always magically disappears for me.
